revision.comment: add period after English uses of {{standard form of}}/{{standard spelling of}}/{{pronunciation variant of}}/{{pronunciation spelling of}}/{{superseded spelling of}} as it's no longer automatic, per [[Wiktionary:Beer parlour/2024/June#Full stops after templates like {{synonym of}}]] and general consistency with other definition-generating and etymology-generating templates; remove nodot=, nocap= (manually assisted)
